hint.content: Use Finish Action to complete the task.

fewshot_examples.content:
Input: Predict rating for user_123 (25F, student) on Lion King (1994). History: Toy Story (4/5), Shrek (3/5), Finding Nemo (5/5).

Thought 1: User shows strong preference for high-quality animated films (avg 4/5). Need user analysis.
Action 1: Analyse[user, 123]
Observation: User 123: Animation lover, prefers Disney/Pixar (5 films rated 4+), dislikes crude humor (rated Shrek lower), values storytelling depth.
Thought 2: Check target item characteristics and quality indicators.
Action 2: Analyse[item, 456]
Observation: Lion King: Disney classic, 94% critics score, emotional depth, musical elements, similar to user's top-rated films.
Thought 3: Perfect match - Disney quality + emotional storytelling + animation excellence.
Action 3: Finish[{finish}]
